message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $200.  It's a steal you don't want to miss!
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 is my ideal price, I could come down to $170 for you. It's a high-quality product that you'll love.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $170 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
